DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will assess predictors of early on-treatment and sustained virological response in treatment-naïve patients with chronic hepatitis C initiated on treatment with Pegasys (peginterferon alfa-2a) and ribavirin. Data will be collected during the treatment period (24 or 48 weeks) and 12 and 24 weeks after the end of treatment. Target sample size is <5000.
DOC.brief_title: PROPHESYS 1: An Observational Study on Predictors of Response in Treatment-naïve Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV)Treated With Pegasys (Peginterferon Alfa-2a)
DOC.criteria: adult patients, >/= 18 years of age chronic hepatitis C informed consent to data collection coinfection with HIV or Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) previous treatment with peginterferon and/or ribavirin
